name: ministrike (itch)
description:
A shoot’em up game with bite-size levels about diving into the hole inside a giant meteor and stops it from crashing to the earth.

Features
  • Battle through many different areas with unique enemies
  • Boss fight.
  • Weird and unique graphics with retro vibes.
  • Play solo or couch co-op with your friend.
  • Power by PICO-8.
  • Support joysticks.
  • Music from Pico-8 Tune by @gruber_music
